name: Lanternium
description: You have to find out what happened in this fantastic world and help the Raccoon find his way home!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
